post.body: lmao!!!
where you from that it's so cold?
I would use it if everybody else would :)
Smart ;) Me too!
That is very refreshing to hear. Most fall for the gimmicks used in marketing and advertising and don't know better.
Become a fan of 8th Street Productions on Facebook and keep up with the latest news!

The release of my new EP, "Heart Breaker" to be released early 2009! http://twitpic.com/swcr

Long night in the studio putting finishing touches on "Splash" -new EP by OhD! To be released in the new year! http://twitpic.com/ss6e
Been busy in the studio. The beginning of the year will bring new music, new artists & new opportunities to network. http://twitpic.com/s652
We have grrreeeat weather in Florida while the rest of the US is freezing!! Seems so unfair :))
Under the weather today! Bleh! :-/
